text: The 2025–26 season is the 28th season of competitive football by Dijon FCO. It is the club's third consecutive season of play in the Championnat National, the French third division, after relegation from the French second division, Ligue 2 during the 2022–23 season. ==Transfers== ===In=== Player Transferred from Fee Date Source Mohamed Ben Fredj Le Puy Foot Loan return Alexis Ntamack Pays de Grasse Free Julien Domingues Cannes Free ===Out=== Player Transferred to Fee Date Source Issiaga Camara Nice Loan return Jovany Ikanga Red Star Loan return Mathéo Moussa Released Kévin Schur Released Joseph Mendes Released Souleymane Cissé Released Nassim Titebah Released Rayan Souici Released Mohamed Ben Fredj Released ==Pre-season and friendlies== ==Competitions== ===Overall record=== ===Championnat National=== ====Results by round==== ====Results summary==== ====Matches==== ===Coupe de France=== ==References== Category:2025 in association football
title: 2025–26 Dijon FCO season
